original_title: North Carolina veterinary office explosion injures firefighters after hit-and-run | Fox News
article_summary: A hit-and-run driver crashed into a gas line at a North Carolina veterinary office, causing a fiery explosion that injured four firefighters. The driver, identified as Jason Lee Beach, was later arrested and charged with several offenses. The explosion occurred less than a mile from the University of North Carolina-Wilmington.</s>
